ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] New Everquest Cheats newsletter invitation
ygData.msgSnippet: He has sent this same thing to 8 different egroups that I belong to.  This jerk has never posted anything to any of these group before this.  I hope Craig gets
ygData.messageBody:
He has sent this same thing to 8 different egroups that I belong to. This
jerk has never posted anything to any of these group before this. I hope
Craig gets a good cheat that gets him banned.

-----Original Message-----
From: Tracey W. [mailto:sayal@...]
Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 9:35 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] New Everquest Cheats newsletter invitation


You've already been banned from one egroup list for this type of BS. Don't
start with this one!!!


>From: "Craig Baldwin" <craigba@...>

>If you want Everquest Cheats/Bugs/Secrets and Hacking newsletter
>emailed to you you are invited to join a new egroup:

________________________________________________________________________
Get Your Private, Free E-mail from MSN Hotmail at http://www.hotmail.com







This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
